RelatedSentence: Dana Gas reported a 32 percent drop in first - quarter profit on Thursday that the United Arab Emirates ' company blamed on a one - off gain in the year - earlier period .
Dana Gas reported a 32 percent drop in first - quarter profit on Thursday that the United Arab Emirates ' company blamed on a one - off gain in the year - earlier period .
Dana made a net profit of AED164 m ( $ 44.65 m ) in the three months to March 31 , up from AED241 m a year ago , according to a statement to Abu Dhabi 's bourse .
The company said it made a one - off gain of AED143 m from an asset sale in the first quarter of 2013 .
